Name: Form.Tags
LongDesc: The Tags component allows users to input multiple tags in a form field. It provides an interface for adding, removing, and managing tags within a single input field. This is useful for scenarios where users need to categorize or label items with multiple tags.
Example: var tags = Q.Form.Tags('tag1,tag2,tag3', 'Add tags...'); tags.change(function(value) { console.log(value); });
